value:
The quintessence from the Black
Fang has all been used. This place
should provide the next harvest.

I steal quintessence from the strong.
With it, Lord Nergal's ritual to call
forth the dragons will be completed.

Your concern is not necessary. I will
handle any obstacles to my mission.

My method of obtaining quintessence
is far more direct than the schemes
Sonia employs.

This world has an abundance of
strong individuals. It is like a box filled
with glittering jewels.$k$pI must observe closely to determine
which is the most exceptional.

It would appear you have a marvelous
quintessence. As I expected from a
friend of $Nf.

As Lord Nergal commands, I shall
kill all those who bear signs of
great power.
I've come for your quintessence.
Hm.

Morphs are not human—no matter
what you give us, we will not change.
Only Lord Nergal has that ability.

My name is Limstella. Everything is
guided by my master, including my
presence here.

My name is Limstella. A morph of
perfect beauty and strength, created
by Lord Nergal. One beyond humanity.$k$pSince I am not human, this body is
nothing more than an empty vessel.
There is no need for imperfections.$k$pHowever... When Lord Nergal calls to
me, something within me stirs. I have
learned this is called joy and sorrow.$k$p...Sorrow? Did I say sorrow? Why
would I say such a thing?$k$pYour hidden quintessence leads me
astray. Do not come any nearer.
I... I am Lord Nergal's...
はっ
これで
うっ
バカな…
Begone.
Your quintessence is his.
Utterly useless.
For my master.
Lord Nergal...
Hmph...
My name is Limstella. I am a puppet created by Lord Nergal.
What are you doing? Why do you humans do such pointless things?
I am not human. This body and this heart are constructs...
As Lord Nergal commands, I shall kill all those who bear signs of great power.
Puppets have no essence to harvest. Not I, nor Sonia.
As long as my mission is fulfilled and Lord Nergal is pleased, all else is irrelevant.
You have marvelous quintessence... I am certain of it.
As you will.
What?
Leave it to me.
